name: S̶p̶i̶d̶e̶r̶s̶
description:
What's the Big Idea?

Lets start with taking every spider* in existence... and jettisoning them into a black hole.

Finally, a perfect world with no spiders! What will we find instead? 

Spiders is a short, free comedy game made over a few months just for a laugh. Available on both PC and Mac.

* This game does not contain any spiders!! I have bad arachnophobia so I wouldn't do that to you

Controls:

  • Mouse input for all gameplay!
  • Escape key to pause the game and access menus.
